Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) was developed for the direct utilization of dry glycerol to produce electricity at 800 degrees C. A state-of-art SOFC anode was covered by a thin (<10 mu m) electrocatalyst layer based on a Ni-modified perovskite and ceria.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Fed Directly with Dry Glycerol

Sentencas: This electrocatalyst layer worked as an internal integrated fuel processor to convert glycerol in syngas.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Fed Directly with Dry Glycerol

Sentencas: A performance of about 850 mW cm(-2) @ 0.6 V was achieved with dry glycerol.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Fed Directly with Dry Glycerol

Sentencas: A life time test of 160 hrs showed no relevant occurrence of carbon deposits.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Fed Directly with Dry Glycerol

Sentencas: The developed approach can provide a practical route to achieve effective fuel flexibility in SOFCs.
Titulo: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Fed Directly with Dry Glycerol
